```{r}

plots <- lapply(1:4, function(x) {
  mjs_plot(rbeta(1000, x, x), width = 300, height = 300, linked = TRUE) %>%
    mjs_histogram(bar_margin = 2) %>%
    mjs_labs(x_label = sprintf("Plot %d", x))
})

mjs_grid(plots)
```
